meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was absolutely bitchin!
meanings.sent2: The new car design is so bitchin.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the party agreed that the cake was bitchin.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as bitchin as a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was truly bitchin.

meanings.sent1: She gave a bitchin cheer for her team.
meanings.sent2: The crowd's reaction was bitchin after the performance.
meanings.sent3: His high-five was so bitchin, it echoed in the room.
meanings.sent4: The applause was as bitchin as a thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: Their smiles were filled with bitchin excitement.

meanings.sent1: The sunglasses she wore were totally bitchin.
meanings.sent2: His skateboard tricks are always so bitchin.
meanings.sent3: The retro outfit she put together looked bitchin.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti art on the wall was as bitchin as a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The new hairstyle was undeniably bitchin.
